Texas.title: Future General Business Activity; Percentage Reporting Increases for Texas
Texas.notes: Future General Business Conditions, General Business Activity, reports the likely direction of general business activity for the manufacturing firm over the previous month for the state of Texas. The General Business Activity is the broadest measure of the Texas Manufacturing Outlook Survey and focuses on firms' perceptions of the broader business activity. For further information regarding the Texas Manufacturing Outlook Survey release from the Federal Reserve Bank of Dallas visit: https://www.dallasfed.org/research/surveys/tmos.aspx#tab-reports.
